text: Hypochthoniidae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are at least 4 genera and 20 described species in Hypochthoniidae. ==Genera== * Eohypochthonius Jacot, 1938 * Hypochthonius Koch, 1835 * Malacoangelia Berlese, 1913 * Nothrolohmannia Balogh, 1968 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Hypochthoniidae
